title.rendered: 3 People You’ll Meet in College Who Can Help You Network

content.rendered:
We hear from a lot of students that networking can feel intimidating—but it doesn’t have to be! Handshake can help you make valuable connections through employer and alumni messaging, virtual networking events, and virtual 1-on-1 sessions at career fairs. Plus, you’ll meet a few types of people during college who can help you start to build your network. Watch the video below for a quick breakdown about how professors, career counselors, and alumni can help you prepare for success in the world of professional networking!

Plus, don’t forget to follow us on TikTok and Instagram for more tips on networking, internship success, and more.

For more networking prep, check out the following resources:

  • How to Introduce Yourself at a Networking Event in 30 Seconds
  • Networking 101: 5 Steps to Build Your Career Connections
  • How to Prepare for Virtual 1-on-1 Sessions

Photo by Cleyder Duque from Pexels
